19001299.en:
<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>Who is it?
This is auntie Fluka's house.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001299.ja:
<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「誰？
　ここは　フルッカおばちゃんの　おうちよ。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001299.ko:
<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 당신들 누구야?
　여긴 프룻카 이모 집이야.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001299.zh-Hans:
<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>你是谁？
这里是菲尔迦婶婶的家。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001299.zh-Hant:
<voice 00110_19001299><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>什麼人？
這裡是菲爾迦姑姑的家喔。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001300.en:
<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Fifi! Neglectin' yer training, justa read books again,
are ya!<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001300.ja:
<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「フィーフィ！　
　また　修業を放りだして
　本ばかり　読んで！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001300.ko:
<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 퓌퓌! 
　또 수련은 안 하고
　책만 읽고 있었니!?<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001300.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>菲菲！
你又抛下修炼，
光顾着看书！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001300.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_19001300><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>菲菲！
妳又拋下修練，
光顧著看書！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001301.ja: <voice 00420_19001301><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「あら　あなたは……？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001301.ko: <voice 00420_19001301><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 어라, 당신은……?<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001301.zh-Hans: <voice 00420_19001301><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001301.zh-Hant: <voice 00420_19001301><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是……？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8095.en: <voice 00580_00008095><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>There's no way...!<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8096.en: <voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Pardon me, but yer <pc>, ain't ya?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8096.ja:
<voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「失礼ですが　あなたは
　<pc>という名前の方では
　ありませんか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8096.ko:
<voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 실례지만 혹시
　{pc}|hpp(이라,라)는 분이
　아니신가요?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8096.zh-Hans:
<voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>容我冒昧地问一句，
您的名字是叫
<pc>么？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8096.zh-Hant:
<voice 00720_00008096><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>不好意思，
請問你的名字
是叫<pc>嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8097.en:
<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Hehehe. No use tryin' ta pull da wool ovah my eyes.
I see right through ya, dear.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8097.ja:
<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「フフフ。ごまかしたって　ムダですよ。
　私には　わかるのですから。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8097.ko:
<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 후후후. 아닌 척하셔도 소용없어요.
　저는 알 수 있거든요.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8097.zh-Hans:
<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，您骗不了我。
我能看得出来。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8097.zh-Hant:
<voice 00806_00008097><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，就算你想敷衍也沒用，
我知道的。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8098.en:
<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Oh, glorious day! At long last, da
time's come for da Ship Shapers'
dreams to come true.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8098.ja:
<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「ああ！　ついに　破邪舟師の悲願が
　果たされるときが　きたのですね。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8098.ko:
<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 아아! 드디어 파사주사의 숙원을
　이룰 때가 왔군요.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8098.zh-Hans:
<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>啊！完成破邪舟术师夙愿的时刻
终于来临了。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8098.zh-Hant:
<voice 00836_00008098><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>啊！破邪舟術師的心願
終於要實現了啊。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8099.en:
<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Ahh! I knew it! At long last, da time's come for da
Ship Shapers' dreams to come true.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8099.ja:
<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「ああ！　やはり！
　ついに　破邪舟師の悲願が
　果たされるときが　きたのですね。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8099.ko:
<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 아아! 그럴 줄 알았어요!
　드디어 파사주사의 숙원을
　이룰 때가 왔군요.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8099.zh-Hans:
<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>啊，果然！
完成破邪舟术师夙愿的时刻
终于来临了。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8099.zh-Hant:
<voice 00765_00008099><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>啊！果然！
破邪舟術師的心願
終於要實現了啊。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001302.en:
<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>The story of Erju again...
Isn't that just a fairy tale?<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001302.ja:
<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「また　エルジュさまの話～？
　あれって　おとぎ話でしょ……。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001302.ko:
<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 또 에르주 님 얘기야~?
　그런 건 그냥 옛날이야기잖아…….<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001302.zh-Hans:
<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>又要讲爱尔修大人的故事～？
那只不过是童话故事吧……<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001302.zh-Hant:
<voice 00877_19001302><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>又要講艾爾修大人的故事～？
那只不過是童話故事吧……<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001303.en:
<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>I've been telling it like a fairy tale, but ya see,
the story was true. And this is the person we've been
waiting for!<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001303.ja:
<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「おとぎ話のように　聞かせてたけどね
　あれは　本当にあった話なの。
　この方こそ　私たちが待ちのぞんでいた人！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001303.ko:
<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 옛날이야기처럼 들려 줬지만
　그건 정말로 있었던 일이란다.
　이분이야말로 우리가 기다리던 분이지!<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001303.zh-Hans:
<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>虽然我一直当故事讲给你听，
但却是真的……
这位正是我们苦苦等待的人！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001303.zh-Hant:
<voice 00922_19001303><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>雖然我一直當故事講給妳聽，
但那些都是實際發生的事喔。
這位正是我們苦苦等待的人！<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001304.ja:
<voice 00923_19001304><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「へ～。
　すご～い。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001304.ko:
<voice 00923_19001304><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 흐음~
　정말 대단하네~<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001304.zh-Hans:
<voice 00923_19001304><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>是吗～
真厉害～<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001304.zh-Hant:
<voice 00923_19001304><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>是喔～
真厲害～<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001306.en:
<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>That child is my niece, Fifi. I'm thinking of taking her
on as my successor.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001306.ja:
<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「あの子は　私のめい　フィーフィ。
　次の継承者にと　考えておりますの。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001306.ko:
<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 저 아이는 제 조카인 퓌퓌예요.
　다음 계승자로 점찍어 뒀죠.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001306.zh-Hans:
<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>那孩子是我的侄女菲菲，
是我未来继承人的不二人选哦。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001306.zh-Hant:
<voice 01252_19001306><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>那孩子是我的姪女菲菲。
我打算讓她成為下個繼承人。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001307.en:
<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>She's got the potential to be da greatest of all da
Ship Shapers, but... It's just, as ya may have noticed...<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001307.ja:
<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「秘めた力は　歴代破邪舟師のなかでも
　ずば抜けているんですが……
　ただ　ご覧の通り……。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001307.ko:
<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 타고난 힘은 역대 파사주사 중에서도
　특출나게 뛰어난데……
　다만 보시다시피…….<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001307.zh-Hans:
<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>她身上蕴藏的力量在历代破邪舟术师当中
也是相当出类拔萃的……
只不过就如您所见……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001307.zh-Hant:
<voice 01282_19001307><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>她身上蘊藏的力量在歷代破邪舟術師當中
也是相當出類拔萃的……
只不過就如您所見……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001308.en:
<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Why is it, do ya think... She has no drive whatsoever
and gives up right away...<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001308.ja:
<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「なんで　ですかねぇ……。
　やる気が　ぜんぜん無くて
　なんでも　すぐ　無駄だって……。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001308.ko:
<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 대체 왜일까요……?
　의욕이라곤 하나도 없어서
　소용없단 말을 입에 달고 살아요…….<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001308.zh-Hans:
<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>真不知道是为什么……
完全提不起干劲，
任何事都觉得没意义……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001308.zh-Hant:
<voice 01283_19001308><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>真不曉得是為什麼……
完全提不起幹勁，
任何事都覺得沒意義……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001309.en:
<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>...The clan of Ship Shapers has painstakingly passed
down yer story through da ages and have been
eagerly awaiting yer arrival.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001309.ja:
<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「……せっかく　破邪舟師の一族は
　あなたのことを語り継ぎ　悠久の時の中で
　その到着を　心待ちにしていましたのに。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001309.ko:
<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: ……기껏 저희 파사주사 일족이
　당신의 이야기를 대대손손 전하며 오랜 시간
　당신이 오기를 손꼽아 기다렸는데 말이죠.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001309.zh-Hans:
<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>……枉费我们破邪舟术师一族
代代流传您的故事，在漫长的岁月中
等待着您的到来。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001309.zh-Hant:
<voice 01347_19001309><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>……枉費我們破邪舟術師一族
代代流傳您的故事，在漫長的歲月中
等待著您的到來。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001310.en: <voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Yes, I've been waiting for quite some time now.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001310.ja: <voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「そう　ずっと　お待ちしておりました。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001310.ko: <voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 맞아요, 계속 당신을 기다리고 있었어요.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001310.zh-Hans: <voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>没错，我们一直都在等待着您的到来。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001310.zh-Hant: <voice 01348_19001310><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>沒錯，我們一直都在等待著您的到來。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8103.en:
<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>When a great darkness is born into da world, a
traveler named <pc> will appear seekin'
our family's art of da Sacred Ship.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8103.ja:
<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「この世に　大いなる闇が生まれしとき
　<pc>という名の旅人が
　破邪舟の術を求め　我ら一族の前に現れる。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8103.ko:
<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 이 세계에 거대한 어둠이 태어났을 때
　{pc}|hpp(이라,라)는 여행자가
　파사주의 술법을 찾아 우리 일족을 찾아오리라.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8103.zh-Hans:
<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>当巨大的黑暗降临于世时，
有一位名为<pc>的旅行者
将会为了寻求破邪舟之术出现在我们一族面前。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8103.zh-Hant:
<voice 01377_00008103><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>在這世間出現龐大黑暗時，
有個叫<pc>的旅人
尋求破邪舟之術，出現在我們一族面前。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8104.en:
<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Until that day comes, we must never let da Sacred
Ship art die out...<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8104.ja:
<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「そのときがくるまで　絶対に
　破邪舟の術を　絶やしてはいけない……。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8104.ko:
<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 그때가 올 때까지 절대로
　파사주의 술법이 끊어지지 않게 하라…….<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8104.zh-Hans:
<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>在那个时刻来临之前，
绝不可以让破邪舟之术失传……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8104.zh-Hant:
<voice 01417_00008104><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>在那個時候來臨前，絕對
不可以讓破邪舟之術斷絕……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8105.en:
<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>For more than 500 years, generations of Sacred Sailors
'ave kept that vow.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8105.ja:
<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「父祖エルジュより　５００年
　破邪舟師は　代々その言いつけを
　守ってまいりました。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8105.ko:
<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 파사주사는 500년 동안
　조상인 에르주가 남긴 그 말을
　대대로 지키며 살았습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8105.zh-Hans:
<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>从先祖爱尔修开始，
我们破邪舟术师５００年来
一直坚守着这个祖训。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8105.zh-Hant:
<voice 01447_00008105><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>從祖先艾爾修開始５００年來，
每一代破邪舟術師都遵守著
這個遺訓。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8106.en:
<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>And then a few months ago, in the eastern sea, a great
darkness... I witnessed da birth of Hades' Heart wit'
my own eyes; I was convinced:<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8106.ja:
<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「そして　今から数か月前　東の海より
　大いなる闇……　冥王の心臓が　誕生するさまを
　この目で見たとき　確信したのです。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8106.ko:
<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 그리고 지금으로부터 몇 달 전, 동쪽 바다에서
　거대한 어둠…… 명왕의 심장이 탄생하는
　광경을 제 눈으로 목격하고 확신했죠.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8106.zh-Hans:
<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>几个月前，我亲眼目睹巨大的黑暗……
冥王心脏从东边的大海中诞生，
当时我确信了一件事。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8106.zh-Hant:
<voice 01502_00008106><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>然後距今幾個月前，東海出現
龐大黑暗……當我親眼看到冥王心臟
誕生時的樣子，我確信了。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8107.en:
<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>I was chosen to be da Ship Shaper that'll carry ya,
<pc>, to da Netherlord...<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8107.ja:
<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「<pc>さまを
　冥王のもとまで運ぶ　破邪舟師に
　私が　選ばれたのだと……。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8107.ko:
<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님을
　명왕에게 안내할 파사주사로
　제가 선택받았다는 것을…….<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8107.zh-Hans:
<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>我将是那个有幸能把
<pc>大人送去讨伐冥王的
破邪舟术师……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8107.zh-Hant:
<voice 01532_00008107><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>我就是那個
將<pc>大人送到冥王身邊
的破邪舟術師……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8108.en:
<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Immediately, I scurried to da summit of the
Landon Mountains where Hades' Heart was located
to await yer arrival, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8108.ja:
<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「私は　これより　冥王の心臓のある
　ランドン山脈　山頂へ向かい
　<pc>さまの到着を　待っております。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8108.ko:
<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 저는 지금부터 명왕의 심장이 있는
　랭든산맥의 정상으로 가서
　<pc> 님의 도착을 기다리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8108.zh-Hans:
<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>我马上前往冥王心脏
所在的兰顿山脉山顶
等待<pc>大人。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8108.zh-Hant:
<voice 01582_00008108><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>我現在要前往冥王心臟所在的
蘭頓山脈山頂，
等候<pc>大人的到來。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8110.en: <voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Hohoho. <pc>, ye've done well.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8110.ja:
<voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ふっふっふ。<pc>よ。
　よくぞ　やってくれたのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8110.ko:
<voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 후후후. <pc>.
　아주 잘해 주었군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8110.zh-Hans:
<voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，<pc>，
看来你成功了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8110.zh-Hant:
<voice 02222_00008110><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，<pc>啊，
做得漂亮。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8111.en:
<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Thanks ta all yer hard work, the art o' the Sacred Ship
'as been passed on; I almost didn't even recognize the
former lazybones Fluka fer the mensch she became.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8111.ja:
<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしの働きで　破邪舟の術は　ぶじ継承され
　あの　ものぐさだったフルッカも
　見ちがえるような　真人間になったわい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8111.ko:
<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네의 활약 덕에 파사주의 술법은
　무사히 계승되고 그토록 게으르던 프룻카도
　못 알아볼 만큼 성실해졌다네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8111.zh-Hans:
<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>经过你的一番努力，
不但破邪舟之术得以保存至今，
就连那个懒蛋菲尔迦都脱胎换骨了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8111.zh-Hant:
<voice 02252_00008111><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>因為你的努力，順利繼承了破邪舟之術，
而且那個怕麻煩的菲爾迦，
也脫胎換骨變得獨當一面。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001311.en:
<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>First, we need ta see if ye can get ta Hades' Heart with
the Sacred Ship!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001311.ja:
<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「破邪舟で　冥王の心臓へ行けるか
　まず　それを確かめるのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001311.ko:
<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 우선 파사주로 명왕의 심장에
　갈 수 있을지 확인해 보게나!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001311.zh-Hans:
<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我们得先确认
搭乘破邪舟能否到达冥王心脏！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001311.zh-Hant:
<voice 02472_19001311><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我們得先確認
搭乘破邪舟能否到達冥王心臟！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8114.en:
<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now, ya'd better go. Fluka awaits ye at the summit of
the Landon Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8114.ja:
<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「さあ　行くがよい。
　ランドン山脈の山頂で　フルッカが
　おぬしを　待っておる。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8114.ko:
<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서 가 보게나.
　랭든산맥 정상에서 프룻카가
　자네를 기다리고 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8114.zh-Hans:
<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好了，快走吧。
菲尔迦还在兰顿山脉的山顶
等着你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8114.zh-Hant:
<voice 02552_00008114><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好，去吧。
菲爾迦在蘭頓山脈山頂
等著你。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8115.en:
<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I'm countin' on ye, <pc>! I know ye 'ave the
power ta strike Nergel down!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8115.ja:
<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「頼んだぞ　<pc>！
　わしは　おぬしのチカラを
　信じておるからな！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8115.ko:
<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 잘 부탁하네, <pc>!
　난 자네의 힘을
　믿고 있다네!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8115.zh-Hans:
<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>拜托了，<pc>！
我相信你的实力！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8115.zh-Hant:
<voice 02582_00008115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>拜託你了，<pc>！
我相信
你的力量！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001312.en: <voice 00000_19001312><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>Okay then, here we go!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001312.ja: <voice 00000_19001312><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　いくわよ！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001312.ko: <voice 00000_19001312><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 그럼 시작할게!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001312.zh-Hans: <voice 00000_19001312><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>那就开始啰！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001312.zh-Hant: <voice 00000_19001312><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>那就開始囉！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001313.ja: <voice 00001_19001313><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「はああああぁぁぁぁぁ……。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001313.zh-Hans: <voice 00001_19001313><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>哈啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊……<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001313.zh-Hant: <voice 00001_19001313><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>哈啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊……<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001314.en: <voice 00002_19001314><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Huh!? Is that...?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001314.ja: <voice 00002_19001314><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ん！？　あれは……？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001314.ko: <voice 00002_19001314><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 응!? 저건……?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001315.en:
<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>...Long time, no see, <cs_pchero>! That distant vow...
As I promised so long ago, in return for your
act of friendship, I will lend you my power.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001315.ja:
<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>「……久しぶりだな　<cs_pchero>！
　遠い約束……いや　友情にこたえて
　チカラを貸してやるとしよう。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001315.ko:
<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>: ……오랜만이야, <cs_pchero>!
　오랜 약속…… 아니, 우정에 부응해
　힘을 빌려줄게.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001315.zh-Hans:
<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>……好久不见了，<cs_pchero>！
为了回应遥远的约定……不，是我们的友情，
我就助你一臂之力吧。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001315.zh-Hant:
<voice 00003_19001315><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>……好久不見了，<cs_pchero>！
為了回應遙遠的約定……不，是我們的友情，
我就助你一臂之力吧。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001316.en:
<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>...That girl is the exact opposite of me, ya know.
She has talent, but lacks the drive.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001316.ja:
<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>「……この子は　ボクと真逆だな。
　才能はあるのに　思い切りが悪いんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001316.ko:
<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>: ……이 아이는 나와 정반대야.
　재능은 있지만 패기가 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001316.zh-Hans:
<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>……这孩子跟我是完全相反呢。
明明有才能却非常优柔寡断。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001316.zh-Hant:
<voice 00004_19001316><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>……這孩子跟我是完全相反呢。
明明有才能卻非常優柔寡斷。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001317.en:
<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>She won't even take the first step for fear of failure;
it's been quite frustrating to see.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001317.ja:
<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>「失敗することばかり考え
　一歩も　動こうとしないから
　歯がゆい思いを　させられたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001317.ko:
<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>: 실패할 거란 생각에 빠져
　한 발짝도 움직이려 하지 않는 바람에
　나도 답답했다니까.<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001317.zh-Hans:
<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>因为她老是想着失败，
完全不肯踏出半步，
实在让旁人看得很心急。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001317.zh-Hant:
<voice 00005_19001317><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>因為她老是想著失敗，
完全不肯踏出半步，
實在讓旁人看得很心急。<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001318.en:
<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>Well, <cs_pchero>, you may
once again use my clans power to
its full extent!<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001318.ja:
<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>「さぁ　<cs_pchero>
　我が一族のチカラ
　また　存分に使ってくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001318.ko:
<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>: 자, <cs_pchero>.
　우리 일족의 힘을
　다시 한번 네게 빌려줄게!<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001318.zh-Hans:
<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>好了，<cs_pchero>，
我们一族的力量，
你尽管使用吧！<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001318.zh-Hant:
<voice 00007_19001318><start_lip_sync n00881 _normal m00001>好了，<cs_pchero>，
我們一族的力量，
你儘管使用吧！<stop_lip_animation n00881 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001319.en:
<voice 00008_19001319><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>...Phew...
Well, what do you think?<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001319.ja:
<voice 00008_19001319><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「……ふう。
　どうかしら？<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001319.zh-Hans:
<voice 00008_19001319><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>……呼。
怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001319.zh-Hant:
<voice 00008_19001319><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>……呼。
感覺如何呢？<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001320.en: <voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>The swan is the finest form of Ship Shaping!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001320.ja:
<voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　このスワンちゃんが
　最高の破邪舟だわ！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001320.ko:
<voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 역시 최고의 파사주는
　이 스완이라니까!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001320.zh-Hans:
<voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>这艘天鹅号果然是
最棒的破邪舟了！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001320.zh-Hant:
<voice 00009_19001320><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>這艘天鵝號果然是
最棒的破邪舟了！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001321.en: <voice 00010_19001321><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Fifi! Well done...<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001321.ja:
<voice 00010_19001321><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「フィーフィ！
　よくやってくれました……。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001321.ko:
<voice 00010_19001321><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 퓌퓌!
　정말 잘했다…….<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001321.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_19001321><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>菲菲！
你做得很好……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001321.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_19001321><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>菲菲！
妳做得很好……<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001322.en:
<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>...Before entering Hades' Heart,
may I have a word with you?<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001322.ja:
<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「……冥王の心臓へ向かう前に　ひとつだけ
　お話しさせていただいても　よろしいかしら？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001322.ko:
<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: ……명왕의 심장으로 떠나시기 전에
　한 말씀 드려도 될까요?<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001322.zh-Hans:
<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>……在前往冥王心脏之前，
能允许我说一句话么？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001322.zh-Hant:
<voice 00011_19001322><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>……在前往冥王心臟前，
方便讓我說句話嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001323.en:
<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>It is said that the dark lord Nergel was born
from Reidametes, who you once faced with my
ancestor, Erju.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001323.ja:
<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>「冥王ネルゲルは　かつて　あなたと
　父祖エルジュが戦った　レイダメテスより
　生まれいでし存在と　聞きおよんでおります。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001323.ko:
<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>: 명왕 네르겔은 일찍이 당신과
　조상 에르주 님이 물리친 레이다메테스에서
　태어난 존재라고 들었습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001323.zh-Hans:
<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>我听说冥王内尔格尔是从
被您和先祖爱尔修联手除掉的
莱达美特斯之中降生的。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001323.zh-Hant:
<voice 00012_19001323><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>聽說冥王內爾格爾是從
您和先祖艾爾修交戰過的
萊達美特斯所降生的存在。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001324.en:
<voice 00013_19001324><start_lip_sync n01539 _normal m00001>Defeating the dark lord is a quest set forth
upon by my clan over 500 years ago.
Please help us complete this task at last.<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

所以請您無論如何也要幫我們實現。<stop_lip_animation n01539 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02180_19001330><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>That's why I always say that no matter what we do,

<voice 00005_19001338><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>Fairy tales being different than reality is what makes

19001338.zh-Hans:
<voice 00005_19001338><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>童话故事

<voice 00002_19001354><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>可是所谓的勇者，

19001356.en: <voice 00004_19001356><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>...I've loved it ever since I was a little kid.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001356.ko: <voice 00004_19001356><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: ……어릴 때는 가슴이 두근거렸어.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001356.zh-Hans: <voice 00004_19001356><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>……小时候的我充满了期待。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001356.zh-Hant: <voice 00004_19001356><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>……小時候的我充滿了期待。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001357.en:
<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>The friendship between my ancestor, Erju, and his
friends was so powerful that it performed miracles.
I want something like that too, I think.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001357.ja:
<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「父祖エルジュと　仲間たちとの友情に
　それが起こした奇跡に　熱くなった。
　自分もそうありたいと　思った。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001357.ko:
<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 에르주 조상님과 동료들의 우정에, 그리고
　그 우정이 일으킨 기적에 가슴이 뜨거워졌어.
　나도 그렇게 되고 싶다고 생각했어.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001357.zh-Hans:
<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>先祖爱尔修与伙伴们之间的友情，
还有他们所引发的奇迹都让我很兴奋。
也曾希望自己能像那样。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001357.zh-Hant:
<voice 00005_19001357><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>先祖艾爾修與夥伴們之間的友情，
還有他們所引發的奇蹟都讓我很興奮。
也曾希望自己能像那樣。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001358.en:
<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>But, y'know, it's all just a fairy tale.
Things don't work that way in the real world.
It's impossible, y'know; it's just common sense.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001358.ja:
<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「でもね　ぜんぶ作り話なの。
　望めば　かなうなんて。
　無理でしょ　常識的に考えて。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001358.ko:
<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 하지만 다 지어낸 얘기야.
　바라면 이뤄진다니.
　상식적으로 불가능하잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001358.zh-Hans:
<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>可是，那全都是编出来的。
只要祈求就能实现，
天底下哪有那么好的事。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001358.zh-Hant:
<voice 00006_19001358><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>可是，那全都是編出來的。
只要祈求就能實現，
天底下哪有那麼好的事。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001359.en:
<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>In real life you can't win battles with hopes
and wishes. You have to work hard and
hone your abilities in order to succeed.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001359.ja:
<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「術って　冷静に　合理的に　組み立てるの。
　あるのは　自分の能力と　使いこなす技術。
　願いとか　希望なんかじゃ　何もできないの。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001359.ko:
<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 주술은 이성과 합리성의 산물이야.
　거기에는 내 능력과 그걸 다루는 기술.
　바람이니 희망만으로는 아무것도 할 수 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001359.zh-Hans:
<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>构建法术必须要冷静且合理。
看的是自己的能力与熟练的技术。
凭愿望和希望之类的根本什么都办不到。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001359.zh-Hant:
<voice 00007_19001359><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>建構法術必須要冷靜且合乎道理。
看的是自己的能力與熟練的技術。
憑願望還是希望之類的根本什麼都辦不到。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001360.en:
<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>That's... To get what you wished for, you should do
your best to study, right...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001360.ja:
<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「それは……願ったから　そうしたいから
　がんばって　修業できるんじゃないかなぁ……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001360.ko:
<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 그건…… 그런 바람이,
　하고 싶다는 마음이 있었기 때문에

19001360.zh-Hans:
<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>不就是因为……希望如此，想这么做，
所以才能努力修行吗……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001360.zh-Hant:
<voice 00008_19001360><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>不就是因為……希望如此，想這麼做，
所以才能努力進行修行嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001361.en:
<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>In the end it went smoothly, didn't it; I think it

19001361.ja:
<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「最後には　うまくいく　じゃなくて

　できるまで　やったんじゃないかなぁ……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001361.ko:
<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 결말이 무조건 해피 엔딩인 게 아니라
　해피 엔딩이 되도록 이를 악물고
　될 때까지 노력한 거 아닐까……?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001361.zh-Hans:
<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>并不是最后一定会顺利，
而是拼命努力去做，
直到能够顺利为止吧……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001361.zh-Hant:
<voice 00009_19001361><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>並不是最後一定會順利，
而是拚命努力去做，
直到能夠順利為止吧……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001362.en:
<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>But still, if I can't do it! What do I do if I can't?
It's impossible! No way, it's impossible!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001362.ja:
<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「それでも　それでも　できなかったら！

　無理よ！　無理　無理！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001362.ko:
<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 그래도, 그래도 못 하면!?
　못 하면 어떡해?
　불가능해! 못 해, 안 된다고!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001362.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>就算这样、就算这样还是失败的话！
失败的话，又该怎么办？
我不行啊！办不到、办不到！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001362.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_19001362><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>就算這樣、就算這樣還是失敗的話！
失敗的話，又該怎麼辦？
我不行啦！辦不到、辦不到！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001363.en:
<voice 00011_19001363><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>I'm supposed to be the strongest of all the Ship

<voice 00011_19001363><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「歴代最強とか　天才とか

19001363.ko:

19001363.zh-Hans:
<voice 00011_19001363><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>我被称为历代最强的天才，

19001367.en:
<voice 00015_19001367><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Yeah, well, give it a try.

19001373.zh-Hans: <voice 00021_19001373><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>……我会等着看你们失败的。<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001402.ko:
<voice 00010_19001402><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 다, 당연하지!
　여, 역대…… 역대 최강의
　파사주사를 무시하지 말라고!!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001402.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_19001402><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>那、那还用说吗！
少、少瞧不起……历代最强——！！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001402.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_19001402><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>那、那還用說嗎！
少、少瞧不起……歷代最強──！！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001403.en:
<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>With this, you're free to go beat on Nergel
any time you like!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001403.ja:
<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「これで　いつでも
　ネルゲルとやらを
　ボコりに行けるわよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001403.ko:
<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 이제 언제든지
　네르겔이란 녀석을
　패 주러 갈 수 있어!!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001403.zh-Hans:
<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>这样随时
都能去修理那个
叫内尔格尔的家伙！！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001403.zh-Hant:
<voice 00011_19001403><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>這樣隨時
都能去修理那個
叫內爾格爾的傢伙！！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001404.en:
<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>When you're ready to go, come to the summit of
the Landon Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001404.ja:
<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>「準備ができたら　
　ランドン山脈の山頂に　来てね！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001404.ko:
<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>: 준비가 끝나면
　랭든산맥 정상으로 와!<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001404.zh-Hans:
<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>准备好了
就到兰顿山脉的山顶来吧！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001404.zh-Hant:
<voice 00012_19001404><start_lip_sync n00802 _normal m00001>準備好了
就到蘭頓山脈的山頂來吧！<stop_lip_animation n00802 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001572.en: <voice 00000_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I'm glad you're here.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001572.ja: <voice 00000_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よく来てくれた。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001572.ko: <voice 00000_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 잘 왔네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001572.zh-Hans: <voice 00000_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你来得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001572.zh-Hant: <voice 00000_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你來得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001405.en:
<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Fifi devoted herself ta her trainin'.
She has done her best.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001405.ja:
<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「フィーフィは　がんばったぞ。
　別人のように　修業にうちこみ　
　無事　破邪舟を創りあげたぞい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001405.ko:
<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 퓌퓌도 정말 애 많이 썼다네.
　다른 사람이 된 것처럼 수련에 매달리더니
　무사히 파사주를 만드는 데 성공했지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001405.zh-Hans:
<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>菲菲很努力哦。
简直判若两人似地专心修行，
顺利创造出了破邪舟。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001405.zh-Hant:
<voice 00001_19001405><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>菲菲很努力喔。
簡直判若兩人似地專心修行，
順利創造出了破邪舟。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8132.en:
<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>There's nothing more fer me ta say. I only
offer up me prayers that ye'll destroy Nergel.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8132.ja:
<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「わしからは　もう何も言うまい。
　おぬしが　ネルゲルを打ち滅ぼすことを
　ただただ　祈るのみじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8132.ko:
<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 내가 더 해 줄 말은 없네.
　자네가 네르겔을 무찔러 주기를
　그저 바랄 뿐이라네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8132.zh-Hans:
<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我什么也不说了。
现在能做的只有在心里祈祷
在与冥王内尔格尔的一战中你能获胜。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8132.zh-Hant:
<voice 00002_00008132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我已經沒什麼要說的了。
只祈禱你能
打倒內爾格爾。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001406.en:
<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Go on then. Fifi's waitin' fer ye at the summit
of the Landon Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001406.ja:
<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「さあ　行くがよい。
　ランドン山脈の山頂で　フィーフィが
　おぬしを　待っておるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001406.ko:
<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서 가 보게나.
　랭든산맥 정상에서 퓌퓌가
　자네를 기다리고 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001406.zh-Hans:
<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好了，快走吧。
菲菲还在兰顿山脉的山顶
等着你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001406.zh-Hant:
<voice 00003_19001406><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好了，快去吧。
菲菲還在蘭頓山脈的山頂
等著你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8134.en:
<voice 00004_00008134><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I'm countin' on ye, <pc>! I know ye 'ave the
power ta strike Nergel down!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8134.ja:
<voice 00004_00008134><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「頼んだぞ　<pc>！
　わしは　おぬしのチカラを
　信じておるからな！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8134.ko:
<voice 00004_00008134><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 잘 부탁하네, <pc>!
　난 자네의 힘을
　믿고 있다네!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8134.zh-Hans:
<voice 00004_00008134><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>拜托了，<pc>！
我相信你的实力！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8134.zh-Hant:
<voice 00004_00008134><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>拜託你了，<pc>！
我相信
你的力量！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8130.ko: <voice 00070_00008130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 아닌가.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8131.en:
<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Thanks ta all yer hard work, the art o' the Sacred Ship
'as been passed on; I almost didn't even recognize the
former lazybones Fluka fer the mensch she became.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8131.ja:
<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしの働きで　破邪舟の術は　ぶじ継承され
　あの　ものぐさだったフルッカも
　見ちがえるような　真人間になったわい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8131.ko:
<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네의 활약 덕에 파사주의 술법은
　무사히 계승되고 그토록 게으르던 프룻카도
　못 알아볼 만큼 성실해졌다네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8131.zh-Hans:
<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>经过你的一番努力，
不但破邪舟之术得以保存至今，
就连那个懒蛋菲尔迦都脱胎换骨了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8131.zh-Hant:
<voice 00100_00008131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>因為你的努力，順利繼承了破邪舟之術，
而且那個怕麻煩的菲爾迦，
也脫胎換骨變得獨當一面。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8133.en:
<voice 00260_00008133><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now, ya'd better go. Fluka awaits ye at the summit of
the Landon Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8133.ja:
<voice 00260_00008133><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「さあ　行くがよい。
　ランドン山脈の山頂で　フルッカが
　おぬしを　待っておる。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8133.ko:
<voice 00260_00008133><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서 가 보게나.
　랭든산맥 정상에서 프룻카가
　자네를 기다리고 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8133.zh-Hans:
<voice 00260_00008133><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好了，快走吧。
菲尔迦还在兰顿山脉的山顶
等着你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8133.zh-Hant:
<voice 00260_00008133><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好，去吧，
菲爾迦在蘭頓山脈山頂
等著你。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8135.en:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>You've arrived at last. The sole survivor of
that vulgar village of Ethene.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8135.ja:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　ついに　ここまで　たどり着いたか。
　忌々しき　エテーネの生き残りよ。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8135.ko:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　결국 여기까지 왔군.
　성가신 에테네의 생존자여.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8135.zh-Hans:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>你终于来了，
可恶的伊甸遗民。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8135.zh-Hant:
<voice 00260_00008135><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>終於來到這裡了啊。
令人厭惡的伊甸倖存者。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8136.en:
<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>As anticipated, you Ethenians were a dangerous
seed that contaminated my plans...<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8136.ja:
<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　やはり　貴様たち　エテーネの民は
　この冥王の野望を　おびやかす
　危険な芽であったな……。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8136.ko:
<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　역시 너희 에테네인은
　이 명왕의 야망을 위협할
　위험한 싹이었군…….<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8136.zh-Hans:
<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>你们这些伊甸之民果然是
威胁本王宏图大志的毒芽……<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8136.zh-Hant:
<voice 00325_00008136><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>你們伊甸子民
果然是危險分子，
會威脅到我冥王的野心……<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8137.en:
<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>But to throw yourself at the threshold of
Hades' Heart, my own castle,
is foolish even for you.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8137.ja:
<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　だが　我が居城　冥王の心臓に
　乗り込んでくるとは　おろかなことよ。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8137.ko:
<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　하지만 나의 성, 명왕의 심장에
　발을 들이다니 어리석구나.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8137.zh-Hans:
<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>但是闯入本王的城堡
冥王心脏，实在太愚蠢了。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8137.zh-Hant:
<voice 00385_00008137><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>但你居然闖進我的地盤
冥王心臟，實在是太愚蠢了。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8138.en:
<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>No matter what strength you may possess,
I am invincible in this world
where death reigns supreme.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8138.ja:
<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　貴様が　いくら　チカラをつけようとも
　この　死が支配する世界において　我は無敵。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8138.ko:
<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　네가 아무리 힘을 길러도
　죽음이 지배하는 이 세계에서 나는 무적이다.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8138.zh-Hans:
<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>就算你的实力不容小视，
但在这死亡支配的世界，本王战无不胜。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8138.zh-Hant:
<voice 00425_00008138><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>不管你增長了多少力量，
在這個死亡支配的世界裡，我就是無敵的。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8139.en:
<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>Now, make haste to my throne.
I welcome your visit with delight.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8139.ja:
<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　さあ　早く　我が玉座まで　来るがよい。
　我は　貴様の訪れを　歓迎するぞ。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8139.ko:
<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　자아, 어서 나의 옥좌로 와라.
　나는 네 방문을 환영한다.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8139.zh-Hans:
<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>快点到我的宝座前来吧。
我随时恭迎大驾。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8139.zh-Hant:
<voice 00465_00008139><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>來，快過來我的王座吧。
我很歡迎你的到來。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8149.en:
<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It is good to see you, <pc> of Ethene Village.
I'm proud of you for making it this far.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8149.ja:
<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「また　お会いできましたわね。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。
　よく　ここまで　来てくださいました。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8149.ko:
<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 다시 만났네요.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.
　여기까지 오느라 고생 많았어요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8149.zh-Hans:
<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我们又见面了啊，
伊甸村的<pc>。
你终于到这里来了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8149.zh-Hant:
<voice 00560_00008149><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我們又見面了，
伊甸村的<pc>。
你終於來到這裡了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8150.en:
<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>This pocket dimension is Hades' Heart;
a prison of souls fashioned by the Netherlord's hand.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8150.ja:
<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「この異空間……冥王の心臓は
　冥王ネルゲルが　作りだした
　魂の牢獄とでも言うべき場所なのです。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8150.ko:
<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이 이공간…… 명왕의 심장은
　명왕 네르겔이 만들어 낸
　영혼의 감옥이라고 부를 만한 곳이랍니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8150.zh-Hans:
<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>这个异空间——冥王心脏，
是由冥王内尔格尔建造的
可称为灵魂牢狱的地方。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8150.zh-Hant:
<voice 01185_00008150><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這個異空間……冥王心臟，
是冥王內爾格爾製作的空間，
也可說是靈魂的牢籠。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8151.en:
<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It's designed to congregate the souls of
the dead, turn them into dark magic, and
deliver them to Nergel as a sort of remedial device.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8151.ja:
<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「その役目は　死者の魂を集め
　闇の魔力に変えて　彼に与えるという
　いわば　回復装置のようなもの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8151.ko:
<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그 역할은 망자의 영혼을 모아
　어둠의 마력으로 바꿔 네르겔에게 제공하는
　말하자면 회복 장치 같은 것.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8151.zh-Hans:
<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>它收集死者的灵魂
将它们转化成暗之魔力献给内尔格尔。
就如同恢复装置一样。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8151.zh-Hant:
<voice 01840_00008151><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>其作用是收集死者靈魂，
轉化為闇之魔力，再灌注給內爾格爾，
也就是所謂的恢復裝置。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8152.en:
<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Nergel used a great deal of magical power when he
sealed Lendersia, and has dwelled in the
dark depths of the land ever since.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8152.ja:
<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「レンダーシアを封印するために
　大量の魔力を使ったネルゲルは　以来ずっと
　この地の最深部に　こもっているそうです。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8152.ko:
<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아를 봉인하기 위해
　대량의 마력을 쓴 네르겔은 그 후로 쭉
　이 땅 깊숙한 곳에 틀어박혀 있대요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8152.zh-Hans:
<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>内尔格尔为了封印冷达西亚，
动用了大量的魔力，
此后便一直将自己关在这里的最深处。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8152.zh-Hant:
<voice 01870_00008152><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>內爾格爾為了封印冷達西亞
使用了大量的魔力，
之後他就一直窩在這塊土地的最深處。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8153.en:
<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Now they say that the Netherlord has already
recovered and is even more powerful than when
he sealed Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8153.ja:
<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そして　冥王は　すでに回復を果たし

　絶大な魔力を身につけているとのこと。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8153.ko:
<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그리고 명왕은 이미 회복을 마치고
　렌더시아를 봉인했던 때보다 더욱
　엄청난 마력을 차지했다고 들었어요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8153.zh-Hans:
<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>据说他的身体不但复原了，
还掌握了比封印冷达西亚的时候
更惊人的魔力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8153.zh-Hant:
<voice 02361_00008153><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>據說他已經完全恢復，
還掌握了比封印冷達西亞時
更龐大的魔力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8154.en:
<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If this continues, it is only a matter of time
before all lands fall under his dark seal...<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8154.ja:
<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「このままでは　すべての大陸が
　闇の封印に　落とされてしまうのは
　時間の問題ですわ……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8154.ko:
<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이대로라면 모든 대륙이
　어둠의 봉인에 추락하는 건
　시간문제예요…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8154.zh-Hans:
<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>这样下去的话，所有大陆
迟早都会落入暗之封印……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8154.zh-Hant:
<voice 02391_00008154><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這樣下去，所有大陸
遲早都會落入
闇之封印吧……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8155.en:
<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001><pc> of Ethene Village. I believe that you have
the power to strike down any opponent,
no matter how formidable.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8155.ja:
<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「エテーネの村の　<pc>。
　あなたなら　どんな強大な相手でも
　きっと　倒してくれると　信じております。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8155.ko:
<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 에테네 마을의 <pc>.
　당신이라면 아무리 강대한 상대라도
　틀림없이 쓰러뜨려 주리라 믿어요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8155.zh-Hans:
<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>伊甸村的<pc>，
我相信不论对手有多么可怕，
你都有本事打倒他。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8155.zh-Hant:
<voice 02963_00008155><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>伊甸村的<pc>，
我相信不管對手多麼強大，
你都能夠打倒對方。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8156.en:
<voice 02993_00008156><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>However, Netherlord Nergel is a fearsome demon
who possesses both power and wisdom.
Please be on your guard.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8156.ja:
<voice 02993_00008156><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ですが　冥王ネルゲルは　
　チカラと知恵をかねそなえた　恐るべき魔人。
　くれぐれも　油断しないでくださいませ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8156.ko:
<voice 02993_00008156><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 하지만 명왕 네르겔은
　힘과 지혜를 겸비한 무시무시한 마인.
　절대로 방심하지 마세요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8156.zh-Hans:
<voice 02993_00008156><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>但是冥王内尔格尔是个
集奸诈和力量于一身的不容小视的魔人。
你千万不要掉以轻心。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8156.zh-Hant:
<voice 02993_00008156><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>但冥王內爾格爾是個可怕的魔人，
他兼具力量和智慧，
請你千萬別大意。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8157.en:
<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...I'm afraid that I can't sustain this
appearance here for much longer.
Please be careful...<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8157.ja:
<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……ここでは　あまり長い時間
　この姿を　たもっていられないようですわ。
　どうか　お気をつけて……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8157.ko:
<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……이곳에서는 이 모습을
　오래 유지할 수 없는 것 같아요.
　부디 조심하시길…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8157.zh-Hans:
<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……我似乎无法在这里
长时间地维持这个形态。
请你务必注意安全……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8157.zh-Hant:
<voice 04106_00008157><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……在這裡似乎沒辦法長時間
維持這個樣貌。
請小心……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8140.en:
<voice 00560_00008140><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It is good to see you, <pc> of Ethene Village.
I'm proud of you for making it this far.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8140.ja:
<voice 00560_00008140><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「また　お会いできましたね。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。
　よくぞ　ここまで　来てくれました。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8140.ko:
<voice 00560_00008140><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 다시 만났군요.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.
　여기까지 오느라 고생 많았어요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8140.zh-Hans:
<voice 00560_00008140><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我们又见面了，
伊甸村的<pc>。
你终于到这里来了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8140.zh-Hant:
<voice 00560_00008140><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>又見面了，
伊甸村的<pc>。
你終於來到這裡了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8141.en:
<voice 01185_00008141><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>This pocket dimension is Hades' Heart;
a prison of souls fashioned by the Netherlord's hand.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8141.ja:
<voice 01185_00008141><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「この異空間……冥王の心臓は
　冥王ネルゲルが　作りだした
　魂の牢獄とでも言うべき場所です。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8141.ko:
<voice 01185_00008141><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이 이공간…… 명왕의 심장은
　명왕 네르겔이 만들어 낸
　영혼의 감옥이라고 부를 만한 곳입니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8141.zh-Hans:
<voice 01185_00008141><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>这个异空间——冥王心脏，
是由冥王内尔格尔建造的
可称为灵魂牢狱的地方。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8141.zh-Hant:
<voice 01185_00008141><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這個異空間……冥王心臟，
是冥王內爾格爾製作的空間，
也可說是靈魂的牢籠。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8142.en:
<voice 01840_00008142><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It's designed to congregate the souls of
the dead, turn them into dark magic, and
deliver them to Nergel as a sort of remedial device.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8142.ja:
<voice 01840_00008142><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「その役目は　死者の魂を集め
　闇の魔力に変えて　ネルゲルに与える
　いわば　回復装置のようなもの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8142.ko:
<voice 01840_00008142><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그 역할은 망자의 영혼을 모아
　어둠의 마력으로 바꿔 네르겔에게 제공하는
　말하자면 회복 장치 같은 것.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8142.zh-Hans:
<voice 01840_00008142><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>它收集死者的灵魂
将它们转化成暗之魔力献给内尔格尔。
就如同恢复装置一样。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8142.zh-Hant:
<voice 01840_00008142><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>其作用是收集死者靈魂，
轉化為闇之魔力，再灌注給內爾格爾，
也就是所謂的恢復裝置。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
